text: Munibuke ubwoMusa yasabiraga abantu be amazi (ubwo bari bishwe n’inyota), turamubwira tuti "Kubita inkoni yawe ku ibuye". (Arikubise) riturikamo amasoko cumi n’abiri, nuko buri muryango umenya isoko unyweraho. (Turababwira tuti) "Nimurye kandi munywe ku mafunguro aturutse kwa Allah, kandi ntimugakwize ubwangizi ku isi
